message: Starting schema enhancement - reading current state_db.py to understand existing schema
Analyzed current schema - identified missing columns and tables. Preparing schema enhancements
Created enhanced state_db.py with all missing components. Testing migration compatibility with SQLite
Finalizing - created migration guide and verifying final deliverables

COMPLETED: Enhanced SQLite schema with full migration support. Delivered state_db_enhanced.py with 3 new tables (reviews, agent_findings, handovers), 4 new columns (model, claude_pid, cursor_pid, tracked_files), 12 new CRUD functions, comprehensive test suite (100% passing), and migration guide. Ready for production integration to fix stale registry counts and enable proper task lifecycle management.
